title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that adds Ollama models as first-class citizens inside LangChain LLM, chat and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (formerly ollama-web)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; supports multi-user, RAG, plugins and voice.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for VS Code with inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter: ingest PDFs/Markdown into Chroma and chat over them with Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Lightweight agent framework on top of Ollama that chains tools, memory and planning loops.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions, Spring Boot starter and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, embeddings, model management and streaming via IAsyncEnumerable.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and model initialization.

title: ollama-digitalocean-1-click
summary: DigitalOcean 1-Click App image that spins up a GPU droplet with Ollama and ollama-webui pre-installed.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside notes and auto-complete front-matter.

title: ollama-npm (community)
summary: Community-maintained npm wrapper that downloads and manages the Ollama binary from Node scripts.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/tokio bindings to the Ollama REST API with Serde models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model to your server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command and direct-message chats with configurable model.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama with GenServer-based clients and LiveView hooks for Phoenix apps.
